title: Successful Appointment Booking with Service and Barber Selection
description: Verify that a customer can successfully book an appointment by selecting a service, a preferred barber, and a date/time slot, and receives a WhatsApp notification upon confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the booking page.
Select a valid service from the service selection list.
Select an available barber from the barber selection list.
Pick an available date and time slot.
Confirm the appointment booking.
Verify that the appointment is recorded with the correct service, barber, and time slot.
Verify that a WhatsApp notification is sent to the customer confirming the appointment.

title: Booking Appointment with Unavailable Time Slot
description: Verify the system prevents booking when the selected time slot is already fully booked or unavailable.

steps.description: Navigate to the booking page.
Select a valid service.
Select a valid barber.
Attempt to select a fully booked or unavailable time slot.
Attempt to confirm the appointment.
Verify that the system displays an error message that the selected time slot is unavailable.
Verify that the appointment is not created in the system.

title: POS System: Process Sale with Appointment
description: Verify POS processes payment for an appointment-based sale accurately, generating the correct thermal receipt and updating cash flow.

steps.description: Open the POS interface.
Select an existing appointment for payment.
Enter payment details and select a supported payment method.
Confirm and process the payment.
Verify payment is processed successfully without errors.
Verify a thermal receipt is generated with correct details matching the appointment.
Verify cash flow is updated to reflect the processed payment.

title: POS System: Process Walk-in Sale and Receipt Generation
description: Verify POS handles sales from walk-in customers accurately and generates a thermal receipt.

steps.description: Open the POS interface.
Select a service for a walk-in customer (no appointment).
Enter sale details and payment method.
Process the payment.
Verify payment is completed successfully.
Verify a thermal receipt is generated with accurate sale details.
Verify cash flow data is updated accordingly.

title: POS System: Handle Unsupported Payment Method
description: Verify POS handles attempts to process sales with unsupported or invalid payment methods gracefully.

steps.description: Open the POS interface.
Enter sale details.
Select an unsupported or invalid payment method.
Attempt to process the payment.
Verify that an error message indicating unsupported payment method is displayed.
Verify that payment is not processed and no changes are applied to cash flow.

title: Attendance System: Successful GPS-based Check-in and Check-out
description: Verify barbers can successfully check in and check out using GPS-validated smartphone location and the times are logged correctly.

steps.description: Open the attendance check-in interface on the barber's smartphone.
Perform check-in near the barbershop location with valid GPS.
Verify check-in is accepted and timestamp and location are logged.
Perform check-out at the end of the shift near the barbershop location.
Verify check-out is accepted and timestamp and location are logged.

title: Attendance System: Reject Check-in Outside Valid GPS Zone
description: Verify that the system prevents barbers from checking in or out when GPS location is outside of allowed barbershop vicinity.

steps.description: Open the attendance check-in interface.
Attempt to check in from an invalid GPS location far from barbershop.
Verify that check-in is rejected with an appropriate error message.
Attempt to check out from an invalid GPS location.
Verify check-out is rejected with an appropriate error message.

title: Admin Dashboard: Real-Time Sales Analytics Display
description: Verify that the admin dashboard displays real-time and accurate sales data including total sales, sales by service, and cash flow over time.

steps.description: Log in to the admin dashboard.
Verify sales analytics show correct total sales amount matching POS data.
Verify sales broken down by service type are accurate.
Verify cash flow graphs update in real-time with new sales.

title: Admin Dashboard: Staff Attendance and Shift Monitoring
description: Verify that the admin dashboard displays accurate attendance records and shift details for all barbers including GPS-validated check-in/out times.

steps.description: Log in to the admin dashboard.
Verify the attendance dashboard lists all barber check-ins and check-outs for the day.
Verify GPS location data is displayed and corresponds to valid check-in/out.
Verify shift schedules and holiday configurations are accurately reflected.

title: Admin Dashboard: Commission Calculation Accuracy
description: Verify that commissions for barbers are calculated and displayed correctly based on sales data and configured commission rates.

steps.description: Log in to admin dashboard.
Review commission reports for a specific time period.
Verify commission amounts match the expected calculation based on sales and commission settings.

title: Admin Dashboard: Pricing and Duration Management
description: Verify that administrators can update service pricing and duration through the dashboard and changes reflect on booking and POS systems.

steps.description: Log in to the admin dashboard.
Modify the price and duration of an existing service.
Save the changes.
Verify changes are reflected in the booking service selection.
Verify updated service price and duration are shown in the POS system during sales.

title: AI Appointment Assistant: Successful Booking Guidance
description: Verify the AI assistant correctly interacts with customers, understands their booking requests, and guides them through appointment scheduling.

steps.description: Open the AI Appointment Assistant interface.
Request to book an appointment specifying service, barber, and date/time.
Verify the AI assistant asks relevant questions to clarify booking details.
Verify the AI confirms appointment availability and proceeds to finalize booking.
Verify the booking is created correctly and confirmation is provided.

title: AI Appointment Assistant: Handle Invalid or Ambiguous Requests
description: Verify the AI assistant gracefully handles invalid or ambiguous user inputs and requests for information it cannot process.

steps.description: Interact with AI assistant giving incomplete or ambiguous booking requests.
Verify the AI assistant requests clarification in a user-friendly manner.
Ask AI assistant unsupported or unknown questions.
Verify the AI responds politely with alternative suggestions or redirects to manual support.

title: Barber Portal: View Appointments and Earnings
description: Verify that barbers can view their current and past appointments along with accurate earnings reports in their personalized portal.

steps.description: Log in to the barber portal.
Verify appointments list shows correct appointments with accurate times and customer info.
Verify earnings report reflects payments processed through POS linked to barber.

title: Booking System: Prevent Overlapping Appointments per Barber
description: Verify the system does not allow appointment bookings that overlap with existing appointments for the same barber.

steps.description: Attempt to book an appointment for a barber at a time slot overlapping an existing confirmed appointment.
Verify the system prevents booking and displays an appropriate conflict error.

title: Admin Dashboard: Shift and Holiday Configuration Persistence
description: Verify that shift schedules and holiday configurations set by admin are correctly saved and enforced during booking and attendance.

steps.description: Log in to admin dashboard.
Configure a new barber shift schedule and set upcoming holidays.
Save the configurations.
Verify the new shift schedule is reflected in booking availability for barbers.
Verify attendance check-in/out respects the configured shifts and holidays.
